metadata.title: CVE-2023-43040 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
IBM Spectrum Fusion HCI 2.5.2 through 2.7.2 could allow an attacker toperform unauthorized actions in RGW for Ceph due to improper bucket access.IBM X-Force ID: 266807.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43040` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 18.2.0-0ubuntu6
